item.title: Trump Says US Oil Companies To Spend $100 Billion Of Their Money On Venezuela, Do Not Need Federal Funding
item.description: President Donald Trump said the oil companies need government protection and security more than federal funding to operate in Venezuela.

item.title: Merck In Talks To Acquire Revolution Medicines For About $30B: Report
item.description: The Wall Street Journal reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter, that the deal could be announced as soon as later this month.

item.title: Fed’s Barkin Says Low-Hiring Persists After Recent Data Shows Drop In Unemployment: Report
item.description: According to figures from the Bureau of Labour Statistics released on Friday, employers added a modest 50,000 jobs last month.

item.title: ANPA Shares More Than Tripled Today — What’s Driving The Rally?
item.description: The surge comes amid a flurry of strategic announcements, including a $39 million private placement and the purchase of Step Distinctive.

item.title: Stellantis Stock Drops As It Reportedly Scraps Jeep and Chrysler Plug-In Hybrid Vehicles In US
item.description: CNBC reported on Friday, citing a company spokesperson, that the company has decided to end production of the plug-in hybrid Jeep Wrangler, Jeep Grand...
